metadata.title: CVE-2017-17564 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in Xen through 4.9.x allowing guest OS users tocause a denial of service (host OS crash) or gain host OS privileges byleveraging incorrect error handling for reference counting in shadow mode.

criterions.comment: xen package in esm-infra/xenial is affected and needs fixing.
